translations.chinese: 十餘日， 上欲去，沛父兄固請。
translations.english: After more than ten days, the emperor wanted to leave. The Pei fathers and brothers firmly requested him to stay.

translations.chinese: 上曰：「吾人眾多，父兄不能給。」
translations.english: The emperor said: "My retinue is numerous. Fathers and brothers cannot supply it."
All the empty counties in Pei went to the western outskirts to present tribute.
The emperor stayed and stopped, feasting for three days.
